🔗 AstroJS URL shortener.
Automatically shorten all your external URLs.

🫶 AstroJS convert utilities.
Convert your files automatically.

🪦 AstroJS dead links remover.
Remove your dead links from Astro.

bash

zsh

🙃 A delightful community-driven (with 2,000+ contributors) framework for managing your zsh configuration.
Includes 300+ optional plugins (rails, git, macOS, hub, docker, homebrew, node, php, python, etc), 140+ themes to spice up your morning, and an auto-update tool so that makes it easy to keep up with the latest updates from the community.
